version_description:
[v2.3.1]
• 버그 수정 및 안정성 개선

[v2.3.2]
• 음성인식을 통한 출발지/목적지 검색 기능 추가
• 버그 수정 및 안정성 개선

[v2.3.3]
• 버그 수정 및 안정성 개선

[v2.3.4]
• 버그 수정 및 안정성 개선

[v2.3.5]
• 버그 수정 및 안정성 개선

[v2.3.6]
• 버그 수정 및 안정성 개선

[v2.3.7]
• Fixed bugs and improved stability

[v3.0]
- New services have been added to KakaoTaxi and KakaoTaxi Black – Driver, Parking, Navigation.
- You can use all services conveniently by registering your credit card and vehicle information once.
- The entire app has been completed remade.

Take care of cab hailing, parking, designated driver booking as well as the navigation service using one app! KakaoTaxi has been reborn as Kakao T.

[v3.0.1]
- Bugs fixed

[v3.0.2]
Fixed an issue of certification.

[v3.0.3]
Updates have been made to many parts of Kakao T to ensure a more stable service. We'll continue to make improvements. Please keep your app up to date.

[v3.0.4]
Kakao T provides improved services to users through periodic updates. Please update Kakao T to the latest version now and take Kakao T everywhere you go.

[v3.0.5]
Stability improvements and bug fixes

[v3.0.6]
Kakao T is committed to providing a better user experience through regular updates. Please maintain the latest version for stable service.

- Enhanced local search results for gas stations in Navi.
- Added a new pre-registration menu to enter the start point for taxi hailing in Kakao Mini.
- The start point can be set more easily by using the map in Taxi, Black, and Driver.
- Fixed other bugs and improved stability.

[Active publicity]
Fifteen seconds is enough! Find out how good Kakao T Driver is and why it is always the right pick. Check out the special secrets in the 2019 Kakao T advertisement. (You can view it on App Store and YouTube.)

[update]
1. The (almost) all-waited feature is finally here! Don't be upset anymore when checking out and registering your coupon. Look up coupons at a glance in the new Coupon Box and register them at one go.
2. Are you planning to trip to Vietnam? Don't worry that you don't have a domestic credit card. Mobile payment has been added. Register in advance and feel free to leave! (If your phone has a Usim chip or you have roamed your phone, then you can register in Vietnam.)
3. We've changed the Request screen so that you never get bored while waiting for your Driver.

[QI: Quite Interesting Events]
Post your message on the electronic display board of Kakao T Home Screen. A love confession is most welcome! - Marketer J
(Learn more in the Kakao T Notice Board)

[Release Notes]
Choose the service you want, and gather the information you need at a glance! Enjoy a new "Home Screen" of Kakao T 4.0.

[Update]
1. Improved the taxi calling screen to make it easier to select the type of vehicle (Medium / Large / Limousine) and long-distance premium.
2. A new feature has been introduced to cancel parking at any time even during self-parking, when you use an automated car park through KakaoT Parking (however, pre-booked vehicles do not apply in this case.)

[updates]
1. "Shall we Blue?" Kakao T's new service, Waygo Blue, will soon be launched. When you use Waygo Blue, a nearby taxi driven by a trained driver and equipped with an air purifier will be assigned quickly. (To begin running in Seoul first.)
2. It's the best service ever! Using a bike was never easier. We thank you for your great support and interest. - Kakao T Bike Team

Plus, the women-only taxi service is also scheduled to roll out soon!

Spring is just around the corner. Flowers are beginning to bud. Warm sunlight shines down on you and you'd like to have iced Americano rather than hot chocolate. Kakao T cheers your spring.

Updates
1. You can now add stop points to Kakao T Driver.
2. We fixed other bugs and improved stability.

[v3.0.7]
Kakao T is committed to providing a better user experience through regular updates. Please maintain the latest version for stable service.

- The Pyeongchang Winter Olympics will be held in Feb 2018. English maps have been added for those who want to enjoy the Olympics although they can't read Korean.
- Fixed bugs and improved stability

1. Kakao T Bike is now open - just in time for the spring season!
2. Kakao T Business Driver is also available now! You can call Business Driver for business trips, night shifts, and etc. and take advantage of easy and transparent billing.
3. The Incheon Airport Parking Lot has been added to Kakao T Parking. Enjoy ease reservation as well as the ever-convenient automatic payment service through the app. (Limited to Terminal #2 short-term and long-term parking lots.)

1. Kakao T Bike is now open - just in time for the spring season!
2. Kakao T Business Driver is also available now! You can call Business Driver for business trips, night shifts, and etc. and take advantage of easy and transparent billing.
3. The Incheon Airport Parking Lot has been added to Kakao T Parking. Enjoy ease reservation as well as the ever-convenient automatic payment service through the app. (Limited to Terminal #2 short-term and long-term parking lots.)

[v3.0.8]
We made a few improvements to Kakao T as a nice surprise.
See for yourself how Kakao T is developing!

1. Kakao T launched a corporate taxi service for corporate members. You can use Kakao T corporate taxis for outside appointments, late night working and business trips. (Taxis can be called conveniently after you select a business profile on your Kakao T app. Corporate taxi fares will be settled automatically by a corporate credit card registered by the company.)
2. Improved designs for notices and pop-ups.
3. Added parking lot information, and modified the parking fare system.
4. Fixed other bugs and improved stability.

[v3.0.9]
We made a few improvements to Kakao T as a nice surprise.
See for yourself how Kakao T is developing!
- Fixed other bugs and improved stability.

Spring is just around the corner. Flowers are beginning to bud. Warm sunlight shines down on you and you'd like to have iced Americano rather than hot chocolate. Kakao T cheers your spring.

Updates
1. You can now add stop points to Kakao T Driver.
2. We fixed other bugs and improved stability.

Spring is just around the corner. Flowers are beginning to bud. Warm sunlight shines down on you and you'd like to have iced Americano rather than hot chocolate. Kakao T cheers your spring.

Updates
1. You can now add stop points to Kakao T Driver.
2. We fixed other bugs and improved stability.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[Updates]
1. You can now use multiple features at once.
- Book a parking lot and call a designated driver with Kakao T.
- Send a Black taxi for your friend or family while riding a Kakao Taxi. (Please note that you can't use other services while using the navigation feature for safety purposes.)
2. "LPG Stations" has been added to Local Search options.
3. Other bug fixing

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[Updates]
1. Now you can call multiple taxis at once. Request taxis for your friends or co-workers after a get-together using Kakao T.
2. The cash payment option has been added to "Driver". If you feel uncomfortable registering your card to the app, you can now pay cash to the driver directly
3. The parking fee schedule screen has been improved. You can easily compare parking rates focusing on hourly passes.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.
[Updates]
1. Now you can call multiple taxis at once. Request taxis for your friends or co-workers after a get-together using Kakao T.
2. The cash payment option has been added to "Driver". If you feel uncomfortable registering your card to the app, you can now pay cash to the driver directly
3. The parking fee schedule screen has been improved. You can easily compare parking rates focusing on hourly passes.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.
[Updates]
1. Now you can call multiple taxis at once. Request taxis for your friends or co-workers after a get-together using Kakao T.
2. The cash payment option has been added to "Driver". If you feel uncomfortable registering your card to the app, you can now pay cash to the driver directly
3. The parking fee schedule screen has been improved. You can easily compare parking rates focusing on hourly passes.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[Updates]
1. Employee verification for the corporate taxi service is now easier than ever! All you have to do is to enter the employee verification code sent via KakaoTalk.
2. We also fixed minor bugs.

P.S. We cheer for all of you who worked hard today. You deserve it. -Zoe. Kakao T Corporate Taxi Team.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

2. We also fixed minor bugs.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.
[Updates]
1. Employee verification for the corporate taxi service is now easier than ever! All you have to do is to enter the employee verification code sent via KakaoTalk.
2. We also fixed minor bugs.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[Updates]
1. You can pay for your taxi ride through automatic payment. All you have to do is pre-register your credit card. Now you can get home even if you have lost your wallet. (But no need to lose your wallet intentionally!)
2. Harder, better, faster and stronger. We improved our app to help you quickly reserve parking lots you have used recently.
3. Save your home and work in the app. You can set your start point and destination more easily.
4. Other minor bug fixes.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[Updates]
1. Forgot to reserve a parking lot? No worries. Now you can use Kakao T Parking without reservation. (We're increasing the number of parking lots which don't require reservation.)
2. Drivers with three or more children, the disabled and patriots/veterans can get discount for parking fees.
3. The local search feature for Kakao T Navi has been enhance.

P.S. We'd like to dedicate the parking fee discount plan for drivers with multiple children to a loving husband and hard-working father of three children who live in Bucheon, Mr. Jaehoon Lee.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[Update]
1. Grand Opening! Kakao T Carpool (Kakao T Carpool is Kakao T's new ride-sharing service matching drivers and passengers heading the same direction.
2. Kakao T Japan Taxi is now open! You can call a taxi conveniently in Japan using Kakao T.
3. Minor bug fixes.

[Update]
1. Grand Opening! Kakao T Carpool (Kakao T Carpool is Kakao T's new ride-sharing service matching drivers and passengers heading the same direction.
2. Kakao T Japan Taxi is now open! You can call a taxi conveniently in Japan using Kakao T.
3. Minor bug fixes.

2. Kakao T Japan Taxi is now open! You can call a taxi conveniently in Japan using Kakao T.
3. Minor bug fixes.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[Update]
1. It is finally here! Now you can check your current location during a taxi ride on the app.
2. The "Parked" screen has been improved. You can get estimates including the parking fees and visit/coupon discount in one screen.

The latest Kakao T version is now available. Here's what's new.

[updates]
1. "Shall we Blue?" Kakao T's new service, Waygo Blue, will soon be launched. When you use Waygo Blue, a nearby taxi driven by a trained driver and equipped with an air purifier will be assigned quickly. (To begin running in Seoul first.)
2. It's the best service ever! Using a bike was never easier. We thank you for your great support and interest. - Kakao T Bike Team

Plus, the women-only taxi service is also scheduled to roll out soon!

[Update]
1. "What if I don't park a car tomorrow?" Do you suffer from parking spot anxiety? Goodbye to those days stained with worry and concern. Parking scheduling feature is now available on the Kakao T Parking app. You don't have to wait for dawn any longer. Just book for tomorrow on the app right now!
2. If you're faster than anyone else, if you always take a step ahead of others, like a dazzman swaying to offbeat rhythms, fix your eyes on our predictive text input feature! We've just upgraded the search function.
3. An enhanced user experience for calling a taxi will ensure a flexible flow of vehicle selection.

1. "What if I don't park a car tomorrow?" Do you suffer from parking spot anxiety? Goodbye to those days stained with worry and concern. Parking scheduling feature is now available on the Kakao T Parking app. You don't have to wait for dawn any longer. Just book for tomorrow on the app right now!
2. If you're faster than anyone else, if you always take a step ahead of others, like a dazzman swaying to offbeat rhythms, fix your eyes on our predictive text input feature! We've just upgraded the search function.
3. An enhanced user experience for calling a taxi will ensure a flexible flow of vehicle selection.

[Update]
1. Reporting function has been newly added. Now you can tip us off with information about bikes broken or neglected.
2. Taxi screen displaying "Occupied" has been improved to show a map and your current location in real time.

[Update]
1. Payment method newly added! Now you can use Kakao T Bike with mobile micropayment. After the first one time validation, the payment will be automatically processed just like a credit card (Available services are further scheduled).
2. Q. Is there two wheeler insurance? A. Yes, absolutely! Whenever you use Kakao T Bike, you can selectively buy insurance, but from the latest version.
3. Scan a receipt to validate your parking! You can get an extra discount when you pay for parking (Partially available).
4. Dispatch system for Japan Taxi improved! Enjoy an easier and faster Kakao T even in Japan!

[Update]
1. Improved the taxi calling screen to make it easier to select the type of vehicle (Medium / Large / Limousine) and long-distance premium.
2. A new feature has been introduced to cancel parking at any time even during self-parking, when you use an automated car park through KakaoT Parking (however, pre-booked vehicles do not apply in this case.)

Choose the service you want, and gather the information you need at a glance! Enjoy a new "Home Screen" of Kakao T 4.0.

Which place in Seoul attracts the most taxi-calls?
Which restaurant is the most visited by Kakao Navi users in Jeju?
You will find out the answers if you search for the 2019 KakaoMobility Report. Our report describes the different types of "mobility" that take place in Korea.

[Update]
1. The Service Tab has been improved. ('Service Complete' items for Taxi/Black/Driver are displayed.)
2. Minor bugs have been fixed.

[Active publicity]

[update]
1. “Xin chào!” means “Hello” in Vietnamese. When you travel in Vietnam, call a car on the Kakao T Trip app and say “Xin chào!” to your driver. (We politely recommend you greet the driver with a smile.)
2. We've fixed some bugs that are invisible but must be debugged.

A long-awaited New Year of the Mouse 2020 has dawned! We wish you a new year filled with success and prosperity. Please visit Kakao T, when you have something to see or someone to meet in the course of achieving your goal this year. We will be right there to help you reach out.

[Update]
1. The grand opening of the airport pick-up service in Vietnam! Book an airport pick-up service when you travel to Da Nang and Hoi An! Kakao T will take you to your hotel in comfort.
2. Kakao T has improved its system so that users can use KakaoNavi while booking the Black or Shuttle service.

[Update]
1. The grand opening of the airport pick-up service in Vietnam! Book an airport pick-up service when you travel to Da Nang and Hoi An! Kakao T will take you to your hotel in comfort.
2. Kakao T has improved its system so that users can use KakaoNavi while booking the Black or Shuttle service.

"May this spring bring you all the happiness"
A unique smell of spring is riding the wind at this chilly season.
May your spring be filled with blessings and joy!

[Update]
1. We have overhauled the whole UX to make calling even faster and easier, even though it was fast and easy enough.
2. The safety of Kakao Taxi has been beefed up! Now you can share your real-time location with your friends during the ride.

Spring has come, but daily outbreaks of epidemics make this season ever murky. However, we believe that this, too, shall pass away like the vicissitude of the seasons. We are eagerly praying that a day when you can take off a mask and go on a spring excursion en pan·tou·fles will come soon.

[Update]
1. Improved stability by fixing visible/invisible bugs.

[Update]
1. Making driving more convenient: You can now search for unaffiliated parking lots that are not linked with AutoPay. Please check out parking lot availability when you travel by car.
2. Once a taxi has been dispatched, CLIR is applied when a requestor calls his/her driver.
3. You can now check suggested Pickup Points and No Entry roads before requesting a taxi.

[Update]
1. Making driving more convenient: You can now search for unaffiliated parking lots that are not linked with AutoPay. Please check out parking lot availability when you travel by car.
2. Once a taxi has been dispatched, CLIR is applied when a requestor calls his/her driver.
3. You can now check suggested Pickup Points and No Entry roads before requesting a taxi.

[Update]
1. The call screen of KakaoT Driver has improved to help you meet your driver more promptly.
2. 'Call 112' has been added. You can now report to the police immediately when an emergency arises during your ride.
3. 'KakaoT for business' has been launched as business taxis.
- Business Taxi Plus: KakaoT's big data will ensure faster and more accurate transportation.
- Business Navi Beta: The actual driving information and the estimated transportation expenses are automatically displayed.
4. You can now request a Black taxi from KakaoT Taxi.

[Update]
1. Rating your taxi ride has been dramatically improved. Leave honest feedback on your ride. We will return your favor with better service!
- You don't have to input text to leave a comment on your ride. You can now give us feedback quickly and easily.
- Do not wait to get off to leave a comment. You can submit a rating while you're still on a trip.
2. You can now enter the passenger's phone number utilizing your mobile contacts when you request a Taxi/Black/Driver for someone else.

[Update]
1. KakaoT Driver gets more enjoyable.
- We have improved the Match screen to make you have a safe trip home.
- Surprising benefits for Busan riders! KakaoT Driver offers a special discount for its users in Busan.
2. Minor bugs have been fixed.

[Update]
1. Enjoy a safer Taxi ride! You can now contact 112 immediately using a new in-app Report feature when you ever need urgent help during a trip.
2. AutoPay Plus has been added. Once you apply, parking fees are automatically paid when you exit an AutoPay parking lot. (Wow, it's real!)
3. The automatic input feature has been added for a Driver user who often fails to enter Start Point/Destination. (Wow, again!)
4. Taxi's front page has been improved to keep your Pickup location tracked more easily.

[Update]
1. The Request screen has been re-designed to enrich user experience.
2. 'Premium Driver' have been launched for a more comfortable homecoming experience.
3. Bugs have been fixed.

[Update]
1. The Request screen has been re-designed to enrich user experience.
2. 'Premium Driver' have been launched for a more comfortable homecoming experience.
3. Bugs have been fixed.

[Update]
1. Congratulations! Now you can enjoy the KakaoT Bike service in Hanam and Incheon Seo-gu. Incredible 2nd-generation Bike is just ready for you!
2. Meet a newer KakaoT Driver!
- Request Drivers to your taste. Call Standard drivers for affordable and accessible travel! When you're looking for a high-quality service, request a Premium driver!
- After Busan, you can now use KakaoT Driver in Ulsan at a deep discount. Price optimization suggests the most affordable price in Ulsan!
3. Various bugs have been fixed.

[Update]
1. Congratulations! KakaoT Intercity Bus is now launched!
- On KakaoT, you can now book tickets for intercity routes.
- No need to find a terminal name. Just type your destination.
The best route suggestions and mobile ticketing in one go!
2. KakaoT Parking's AI technology becomes more powerful!
- Before heading towards a parking lot, you will get our 'Real-time Parking Prediction Graph."
- Please refer to the suggested Start Time to avoid a full parking lot.
3. Other improvements reflected, and various bugs fixed.

[Update]
Congratulations on the launch of KakaoT for business Home!
- Smart transport for business travelers & Smart management for transportation expenses
- Click the 'Business' tab at the bottom of the KakaoT app when you get around for business.
- A monthly statement of transportation expenses will be sent to your business email registered with us. (WOW!)
- With KakaoT for business, you can systematically manage your company's transportation expenses. (WOW!)

[Update]
1. You can now view 'Suggested Destinations' on the KakaoT Parking.
- Please check parking lots near your destination with a single click! (WOW!)
2. Congratulations on the launch of KakaoT for business Home!

- A monthly statement of transportation expenses will be sent to your business email registered with us. (WOW!)
- With KakaoT for business, you can systematically manage your company's transportation expenses. (WOW!)
3. The vehicle registration screen has been made concise and straightforward for those who were troubled with registering a vehicle.

2. Other bug fixes and improvements have been made.

[Updates]
1. No cash? No problem! Move with Kakao T Points.
- Recharge points with your Kakao Bank account and use it like cash in Kakao T Taxi, Driver, Parking and Bike!
2. Find and register your vehicle information in less than one minute.
- My Info > Manage Vehicle > Add Vehicle
- Register a vehicle to quickly use the Driver and Parking service! (The new Car Owner service is also coming soon!)

[Update]
1. The existing 'Service Used' tab has been changed to 'Notifications' tab.
- You can now find services being used and event notifications at the 'Notfications' tab!
2. Kakao T Parking
- You are now able to request parking for multiple vehicles at the same time!

[Update]
1. Have you ever been puzzled at seeing a cafe in front of you not appear on the search results?

[Update]
1. All modes of transportation in the world, the new KakaoT
- Find services for my car in one place! 'My Car Tab'
- When you travel from sky to earth! 'Travel Tab'
2. Congratulations! Kakao Flight is now open!
- You can now book domestic flight tickets on KakaoT!
3. Congratulations! Kakao Quick/Delivery is now open!
- You can place a Quick/Delivery order and send your package from anywhere, at your place or office!
4. Waiting for your driver bothers you much?
- The 'Book Driver' function has been added so that you can reserve a Driver for the time you want in advance.

[Update]
1. All modes of transportation in the world, the new KakaoT
- Find services for my car in one place! 'My Car Tab'
- When you travel from sky to earth! 'Travel Tab'
2. Congratulations! Kakao Flight is now open!
- You can now book domestic flight tickets on KakaoT!
3. Congratulations! Kakao Quick/Delivery is now open!
- You can place a Quick/Delivery order and send your package from anywhere, at your place or office!
4. Waiting for your driver bothers you much?
- The 'Book Driver' function has been added so that you can reserve a Driver for the time you want in advance.

[Update]
1. My Car Tab > valet Open!
- From valet parking and payment that does not require cash to requesting an exit, all of this can be done on your app! (wow)
- You can apply for the service after downloading the Kakao Navi app.
2. If there is a recall information on your vehicle, it will be notified on your My Car Tab! (wow)
- Search and register your vehicle now.
- Vehicle registration is available 'on the top of the My Car Tab' or 'My Info'.
